author: srholtvind
title: Simply fun
review: The amount of bricks and possible variation on builds makes this set perfect for sparking creative joy, ecspessially if you are building with kids. My four year found so much building fun with this, and so did I. We have a decent amount of LEGO to begin with, so this was meant as a supplement. The easy builds in the booklet was perfect for her age, and was easily expanded upon.
